text:
Hi team! We plan on releasing a new version of our app, and I wanted to confirm the flow with the new Marketplace:
1/ Create a new app on our Developer account, build, test and release.
2/ Create a listing for the new app, submit it for review.
3/ Once the new app is validated, retire the previous listing.
4/ The previous app, while not listed anymore, would still exist while we migrate our customers to the new package.
Thank you for your help!
